title: P05-1039

sentences.text: In this paper , we present an unlexicalized parser for German which employs smoothing and suffix analysis to achieve a labelled bracket F-score of 76.2 , higher than previously reported results on the NEGRA corpus .
In addition to the high accuracy of the model , the use of smoothing in an unlexicalized parser allows us to better examine the interplay between smoothing and parsing results .

summary: In this paper , we present an unlexicalized parser for German which employs smoothing and suffix analysis to achieve a labelled bracket F-score of 76.2 , higher than previously reported results on the NEGRA corpus . In addition to the high accuracy of the model , the use of smoothing in an unlexicalized parser allows us to better examine the interplay between smoothing and parsing results .
kg2text: The paper presents an unlexicalized parser for German, which employs smoothing and suffix analysis to achieve a labelled bracket F-score of 76.2. This model has been shown to be effective in parsing German text without using pre-defined word meanings. The use of smoothing in this unlexicalized parser allows us to better examine the interplay between smoothing and parsing results.
